features: Jun 2020 - Project V4llain + The Glitch Art Bible
Aug 2020 - Featured Artist: Glitch Artists Collective

education: 2018 - B.S. in Electrical Engineering (with an emphasis in Digital Signal Processing) at CSU Long Beach
2020 - Software Developer Apprentice at Techtonic in Boulder Colorado
cv.objective: To specialize in digital art and/or creative coding while continuously exploring ways to bring the two together!

summary.title: Who Am I?
summary.body: I am a digital artist/creative coder currently based in Denver, Colorado. I've been doing digital art since about 2017 and creative coding since 2016. As I've grown as an artist over the years, I've been discovering more ways to combine art and technology.
